description:
AI was a significant catalyst for change last year. In 2025, organisations that have already started integrating AI into their processes will begin to see a return on investment, allowing them to refine and refocus their use of AI in software development. Recent research by GitLab found that 78% of organisations either actively use AI... Read more »

The post AI in software development: Looking beyond code generation appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: AI in software development: Looking beyond code generation
